#summary Building for Android Add-Ons using Android Maven Plugin

= Introduction =

To Build your android projects which are dependent on Add-Ons such as Google Maps, you need to configure have the maps artifact deployed to your local repository or a repository server you can access (as done by the [http://github.com/mosabua/maven-android-sdk-deployer maven-android-sdk-deployer]).

== Additional development setup ==

   # Add one of the dependency as documented on the Maven Android SDK Deployer site to your project pom.xml.
